qa: Do not force overwrite of QT_QPA_PLATFORM on windows for gui tests

events.message: qa: Do not force overwrite of QT_QPA_PLATFORM on windows for gui tests

events.body: ACK fa06bb607da2d3e35723661156d873c8eac1fa50 - tested on macOS using `QT_QPA_PLATFORM=cocoa src/qt/test/test_bitcoin-qt`.

comments.body: Would suggest adding `if (getenv("QT_QPA_PLATFORM") == nullptr)` so the new instructions for setting `QT_QPA_PLATFORM` work on windows. Or, if you'd prefer to not change behavior in a documentation-only PR, you could add a `// TODO: Fix this to not overwrite QT_QPA_PLATFORM if it is set externally` comment
Thx, added a commit and changed the pull request type to "qa"
